scripts.webpack_full: BUILD_TYPE=full npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/hand-pose-detection-worker.d.ts dist/hand-pose-detection-workerfull.d.ts
scripts.webpack_lite: BUILD_TYPE=lite npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/hand-pose-detection-worker.d.ts dist/hand-pose-detection-workerlite.d.ts
scripts.webpack_mediapipe: BUILD_TYPE=mediapipe npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/hand-pose-detection-worker.d.ts dist/hand-pose-detection-workermediapipe.d.ts
scripts.webpack_tfjs: BUILD_TYPE=tfjs npx webpack --config webpack.config.js && cp dist/hand-pose-detection-worker.d.ts dist/hand-pose-detection-workertfjs.d.ts
scripts.build: npm-run-all clean webpack_full webpack_lite webpack_mediapipe webpack_tfjs webpack
